detaileddescription.para: < Pointer to the resource mediator for managing resources. Power requirement of the building in kWh.
Water requirement of the building in liters.
Sewage cost associated with the building in currency units.
Maintenance cost of the building in currency units.
Name of the building for identification.
Type of the building (e.g., residential, commercial).
List of citizens associated with the building.
Pointer to the state of the building.

briefdescription.para: Construct a new Buildings object.

detaileddescription.para: Initializes a Buildings object with default values for all member variables. All numeric values are set to 0, pointers to nullptr, and strings to empty. This constructor serves as the base constructor for all derived building types.

simplesect.para: This is an abstract class constructor, and objects cannot be instantiated directly. It is called by derived class constructors to initialize the base class members.

briefdescription.para: Virtual destructor to ensure proper cleanup of derived classes.

detaileddescription.para: This virtual destructor is necessary because the class hierarchy uses polymorphism and objects may be deleted through pointers to the base class.

briefdescription.para: Requests the current state of the building.

simplesect.para: Pure virtual function to be implemented by derived classes.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the maintenance cost of the building.

simplesect.para: The maintenance cost as a double, representing currency units.

briefdescription.para: gets the current income of a commercial building

simplesect.para: the income as an integer

briefdescription.para: gets the current income of a commercial building

simplesect.para: the income as an integer

briefdescription.para: Pays a citizen employed in the building.

simplesect.para: The payment amount as an integer.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the power requirement of the building.

simplesect.para: The power requirement in kilowatt-hours (kWh).

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the sewage cost of the building.

simplesect.para: The sewage cost in currency units.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the water requirement of the building.

simplesect.para: The water requirement in liters.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the name of the building.

simplesect.para: The building's name as a string.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the type of the building.

simplesect.para: The building type as a string (e.g., "residential", "commercial").

briefdescription.para: Add a building to the Utility resource.

parameterdescription.para: The building to add to the WaterSupply

briefdescription.para: Gets the number of jobs created by the building.

simplesect.para: The number of jobs as an integer.

briefdescription.para: Receives power for the building.

simplesect.para: true if power was received successfully, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Receives water for the building.

simplesect.para: true if water was received successfully, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Cleans the waste of the building.

simplesect.para: true if waste cleaning was successful, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Cleans the sewage of the building.

simplesect.para: true if sewage cleaning was successful, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Sets the state of the building.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the new state object to be assigned.

briefdescription.para: Returns the list of residents in a building.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the list of citizens residing in or associated with the building.

briefdescription.para: Gets the sales generated by the commercial building.

simplesect.para: Sales amount as a float.

briefdescription.para: Gets the profit generated by the commercial building.

simplesect.para: Profit amount as a float.

briefdescription.para: gets the current income of a commercial building

simplesect.para: the income as an integer

briefdescription.para: Sets the resource mediator for the building.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Utility object to be used.

briefdescription.para: Gets the security coverage provided by the police station.

simplesect.para: The security coverage as a float.

briefdescription.para: Gets the security coverage provided by the police station.

simplesect.para: The security coverage as a float.

briefdescription.para: Gets the waste cost of the building.

simplesect.para: Waste cost as an integer.

briefdescription.para: Gets the health coverage provided by the medical center.

simplesect.para: The health coverage as a float.

briefdescription.para: Gets the birth rate supported by the medical center.

simplesect.para: The birth rate as an integer.

briefdescription.para: Abstract base class representing a building with basic utilities and resource requirements.

detaileddescription.para: This class serves as the foundation for all building types in the city simulation, defining common attributes and interfaces for resource management and state handling.
